title: Sandstorm in a Bottle
summaries: The Sandstorm in a Bottle is an accessory found inside Gold Chests within Pyramids. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it can also be obtained by throwing a Pharaoh's Mask into Shimmer, opening Oasis/Mirage Crates, and via crafting in Hardmode.

It is similar to the <linked>Cloud in a Bottle</linked>, providing a double-jump that allows for some extra height, but instead of a cloud beneath the feet, a sand jet appears and the character visually spins as they ascend on that jet.
The Sandstorm jump goes 15 tiles into the air, totalling 21 tiles when put together with the first jump. This is nearly twice as high as the height achievable with the Cloud in a Bottle.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the holder to do an improved double jump
